Author: lightblueheart
Text: thank you. I think all the Calorie deficit calculators online fuck with me. I want to lose 15 pounds to be at a lower bmi (still "healthy"). they are all telling me to eat from 750 to 1100 and it seems low and confusing.

Author: ashaed31
Text: 1150 is actually too little for almost anyone. An average person needs around 1500-2000 a day, so unless your body is in a starvation state where it holds on to your fat (because you've been severely undereating) you should actually lose about a pound a week as long as you don't stay sedentary.
